name: Planet's Last Breath
description:
WASD or arrow keys to move, space to jump, left click to grappling hook.

In the far future AI takes over and heavily polices the planet. Deciding that there are too many criminals on the planet, they hit the planet's self destruct switch. It's the final three minutes for the planet but maybe you can get past all of the police robots and escape to a nearby rocket before then with the help of your trusty grappling hook.

Made for: https://itch.io/jam/winter-jam-by-solodevelopment

Did most of my work on this in the first 24 hours of the jam, then burnt myself out. I managed to polish it up a little but it is still really unpolished, there's no sound for example. Still though, I'm still happy with what I managed to do given this was my first game jam and I'm very busy in general at the moment. Next time I'm hopefully going to be able to pace myself better and polish whatever I make a lot more.

Fonts used: https://www.1001fonts.com/digital-7-font.html , https://www.1001fonts.com/neuropol-x-free-font.html
